titleStmt.title: A paraphrase and annotations upon all the books of the New Testament briefly explaining all the difficult places thereof / by H. Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for Richard Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
